blur_tooltip: Blurred by Rotector. Click to reveal.
custom_api_docs_error_note: Note: Error responses only occur when there is an internal server error or backend issue. Users not found or not yet analyzed should return success: true with flagType: 0 (Safe).
custom_api_docs_field_badge_color: (string, optional) - Background color (hex, rgb, or named color)
custom_api_docs_field_badges: (array) - Max 3 custom badge objects, each containing:
custom_api_docs_field_evidence: (array or null) - Evidence strings (e.g., from username, display name, description) or null
custom_api_docs_field_reasons: (object) - String-based reason names as keys, each containing:
custom_api_docs_field_reviewer: (object) - Optional. For crediting the human reviewer who verified the flag. Include username and displayName. Omit if automated/no human review.
custom_api_docs_flag_type_2_note: Flag type 2 (Unsafe) is the primary type you need for indicating inappropriate users. Use other flag types only if you have a specific reason for categorizing users differently.
custom_api_docs_intro: Implement two endpoints that return user status data. All responses must use the wrapper format with success, data, and error fields.
custom_api_docs_note_badge_colors: Badge colors support multiple formats: hex codes (#ef4444), RGB (rgb(239, 68, 68)), RGBA (rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.9)), or named colors (red). When color is not specified, badges use a default teal color. When textColor is not specified, badges use white text.
custom_api_docs_note_badges: Badges are small visual indicators that appear in user tooltips alongside the flag status. They display at the top of the tooltip to quickly communicate additional context about a user. Use badges to highlight important status information like verification status, priority levels, or special categories. Common examples: "Verified Unsafe", "High Priority", "Community Reported", "Auto-Detected".
custom_api_docs_note_batch_data: The data field contains an object where keys are user IDs (as strings) and values are user status objects.
custom_api_docs_note_batch_limit: We recommend implementing a limit of 100 user IDs per batch request to balance performance and response time.
custom_api_docs_note_batch_partial: Return only users that exist in your system. Unknown users should be omitted from the response.
custom_api_docs_note_cors: Your API must include the Access-Control-Allow-Origin: * header in responses to allow the browser extension to access your API.
custom_api_docs_note_flag_type_0: Return flagType 0 for users not in your system (not yet checked/unknown).
custom_api_docs_note_http_status: Return HTTP status 200 for all successful requests. Any other status code (4xx, 5xx) indicates a failure and the extension will treat it as an error.
custom_api_docs_note_https: All API endpoints must use HTTPS for security.
custom_api_docs_note_no_auth: No authentication is required. This is a fully public API.
custom_api_docs_note_reason_keys: Use descriptive string names for reason keys (e.g., "High Risk Pattern", "Suspicious Activity"), not numeric indices. These display directly in tooltips.
custom_api_docs_note_url_batch: The extension uses your configured URL directly (without modifications) for batch lookups.
custom_api_docs_note_url_single: The extension automatically appends /'{'userId'}' to your configured URL for single user lookups.
custom_api_docs_note_wrapper: All responses must use '{'success, data, error'}' format. When success: true, include data field. When success: false, include error message.
custom_api_form_alert_url_changed_disabl: API URL changed. The API has been disabled for security. Please enable it again and grant permissions for the new URL.
custom_api_form_error_image_mime: Invalid image type. MIME type does not match file extension
custom_api_form_error_image_size: Warning: Large file size ({0}KB). Consider using a smaller image to reduce storage usage.
custom_api_form_error_image_type: Invalid file type. Please use PNG, JPG, SVG, or WebP
custom_api_form_error_name_length: Name must be 12 characters or less
custom_api_form_error_timeout_max: Timeout must be 60000ms (60 seconds) or less
custom_api_form_error_timeout_min: Timeout must be at least 1000ms (1 second)
custom_api_form_hint_image: Upload a landscape image for the tooltip tab (PNG, JPG, SVG, WebP). Recommended: 480x160px (3:1 ratio).
custom_api_form_hint_url: Must be HTTPS. This is like the base URL for your API endpoints. We'll call '{'url'}'/user/'{'userId'}' for single lookups and '{'url'}'/users for batch lookups.
custom_api_import_error_empty_data: Please paste an API configuration or upload a file.
custom_api_import_error_file_read_failed: Failed to read file. Please try again.
custom_api_import_error_invalid_file_ext: Invalid file type. Please select a .rotector-api file.
custom_api_import_placeholder_paste: Paste the exported API configuration string here...
custom_api_mgmt_alert_import_renamed: API imported as "{0}" (renamed from "{1}" because an API with that name already exists)
custom_api_mgmt_integration_section_desc: Build your own API to integrate with Rotector Extension. Implement endpoints that return user safety data, and your results will be displayed in tooltips alongside Rotector's analysis.
custom_api_mgmt_integration_section_titl: Interested in integrating with the extension?
custom_api_mgmt_intro: Manage all API integrations in one place. Rotector provides core safety analysis, and you can add up to 5 custom APIs for additional content analysis.
custom_api_mgmt_notice_max_reached: Maximum of {0} custom APIs reached. Delete an existing API to add a new one.
custom_api_mgmt_permission_granted_messa: Your custom APIs can now connect to external websites. You can enable or disable individual APIs using the toggles below.
custom_api_mgmt_permission_notice_messag: Custom APIs need permission to connect to external websites so they can analyze Roblox users. This allows the extension to send user data to your configured APIs and display their results alongside Rotector's analysis.
custom_api_mgmt_test_failed:
✗ Connection failed

API "{0}" is not responding or returned an error.

Please check:
• URL is correct and accessible
• API server is running
• CORS is configured if needed
custom_api_mgmt_test_success:
✓ Connection successful!

API "{0}" is reachable and responding.
developer_logs_clear_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all logs?
developer_logs_empty_hint: Enable debug logging to capture detailed logs
friend_warning_high_risk_message: Proceeding with this friend request may expose you to inappropriate content or harmful interactions.
friend_warning_recommendations_item1: Review their profile information more carefully
friend_warning_recommendations_item2: Report them to Roblox if you see inappropriate content
friend_warning_recommendations_item3: Connect only with users you know and trust
friend_warning_risk_message: This user has been flagged by our detection system. Please review their profile before accepting this friend request.
friend_warning_why_matters_item1: This user may engage in inappropriate conversations or behaviors
friend_warning_why_matters_item2: Your account may be associated with inappropriate users in our system
friend_warning_why_matters_item3: You could be exposing yourself to unwanted or harmful content
friend_warning_why_matters_item4: This user has clear evidence of violating Roblox's Terms of Service
group_members_empty_no_tracked: No tracked users found, or this group is too large to track
group_members_hidden: The group owner has disabled the member list for this group. Use the Tracked tab to view flagged members.
group_members_page_jump_confirm: This will make {0} request(s) to reach page {1}. Continue?
group_members_page_jump_switch: Switch to {0}? Only {1} request(s) instead of {2}.
group_members_tracked_description: History of flagged users who joined this group
onboarding_badge_integration_desc: Number of integrations that flagged this user.
onboarding_badge_queue_desc: User is in the analysis queue.
onboarding_badge_reportable_desc: You can submit a report about this user.
onboarding_close_confirm_message: You haven't finished the setup. You can continue later when you visit Roblox again.
onboarding_feature_queue_desc: Submit suspicious users for AI-powered analysis.
onboarding_feature_tooltips_desc: Get detailed information by hovering over status indicators.
onboarding_feature_voting_desc: Help improve detection by voting on flagged users.
onboarding_features_description: Tools to help keep you safe:
onboarding_finish_feedback: Found a false positive, false negative, bug, or have a feature idea? Let us know in our
onboarding_finish_protection: Roblox may not always protect you from harmful users, but Rotector has your back. We'll help you identify potentially dangerous accounts before you interact with them.
onboarding_language_description: Choose your preferred language and translation settings for the best experience.
onboarding_preset_adult_description: No blur - see full profile information without content being hidden
onboarding_preset_description: Select the preset that's right for you. This controls whether content is blurred.
onboarding_preset_minor_description: Blurs avatars and names on Roblox profiles of users flagged in our system to help protect you
onboarding_preset_notice: You can change this anytime in Settings
onboarding_scope_explanation: We focus specifically on protecting children from predators and sexual content because this represents the most urgent safety concern on Roblox. By staying focused, we can deliver more accurate detection rather than spreading our efforts thin across all content types.
onboarding_status_description: Each user displays a status indicator showing their safety level:
onboarding_status_mixed_desc: Has inappropriate content but insufficient evidence.
onboarding_status_pending_desc: Currently being reviewed by our moderation team.
onboarding_status_unsafe_desc: Flagged for inappropriate content or behavior.
onboarding_translate_description: Automatically translate violation details and reasons to your selected language using Google Translate.
onboarding_welcome_agree_accuracy: I understand that false positives and false negatives can occur, and I will report any issues through website support
onboarding_welcome_agree_responsible_use: I agree to use Rotector responsibly and understand that my access may be revoked if I violate the terms of service or abuse the extension
onboarding_welcome_description: Rotector helps protect you on Roblox by identifying potentially inappropriate users.
outfit_3d_drag_hint: Drag to rotate, scroll to zoom
outfit_viewer_disclaimer: Outfits may have been modified since they were flagged. The current appearance may differ from when the issue was detected.
performance_dashboard_empty_hint: Performance traces appear here during extension use in dev mode
popup_header_description: Real-time safety indicators that warn you about inappropriate Roblox users before you interact with them.
queue_error_modal_failed_message: Failed to queue user ID {0} for review.
queue_error_modal_step1: Check if the user has already been flagged by our system
queue_error_modal_step2: If the error persists, try again in a few minutes
queue_error_modal_step3: If you need support, include the Request ID above
queue_history_empty_hint: Users you queue for review will appear here
queue_notification_safe_message: User {0} scan complete. No issues found.
queue_popup_ack_accuracy: I understand results may not be perfectly accurate and false positives or negatives can occur
queue_popup_ack_all: I acknowledge and agree to all of the below
queue_popup_ack_dynamic_limits: I understand my queue limits increase as my submissions are confirmed accurate
queue_popup_ack_misuse: I understand that misusing this feature may result in restrictions on my account
queue_popup_ack_not_identity: I understand that a user's identity or interests alone are not valid reasons for submission
queue_popup_ack_not_innocent: I have reasonable concern about this user and am not submitting an obviously innocent profile
queue_popup_ack_review_process: I understand results are processed by AI and reviewed by human moderators
queue_popup_ack_scope: This submission is related to sexual or predatory content concerns only
queue_popup_description_analysis: You are about to submit user (ID: {0}) for analysis by our system.
queue_popup_description_reanalysis: You are about to submit user (ID: {0}) for reanalysis by our system.
queue_popup_friends_check_description: Analyze friend list for flagged or suspicious users.
queue_popup_groups_check_description: Analyze group memberships for inappropriate themes or content.
queue_popup_outfit_none: No outfits found for this user
queue_popup_profile_check_description: Analyze username, display name, and bio for inappropriate content.
queue_success_modal_step1: Our AI will analyze this account for patterns of concern
queue_success_modal_step2: If flagged, the user's status will be confirmed within a few minutes
queue_success_modal_step3: Results will be reflected when viewing this user's profile
queue_success_modal_success_message: User ID {0} has been successfully queued for review.
report_helper_action_message: Click below and Rotector will automatically fill the report form with the appropriate category and details.
report_helper_category_item1: Asking for or giving private information
report_helper_category_item5: Real life threats or suicide threats
report_helper_info_message_part1: You can still submit a report
report_helper_info_message_part2: if you believe this user is violating Roblox's Terms of Service.
report_helper_info_message_part3: Rotector allows reporting of inappropriate content in profile descriptions. We don't detect most report categories, including:
report_helper_info_message_part4: If you're reporting any of these violations, please continue with your report and provide specific details to help Roblox moderators.
report_helper_setting_disabled_instructi: Go to the extension popup → Settings tab → Enable 'Show Advanced Violation Details' to use this feature.
report_helper_setting_disabled_message: The Report Helper auto-fill feature requires 'Show Advanced Violation Details' to be enabled in your extension settings.
report_helper_setting_disabled_note: You can still manually report this user using the form.
report_helper_subtitle_not_reportable: Rotector hasn't detected any clearly reportable content in this user's profile description yet.
report_helper_subtitle_reportable: Rotector identified profile content violating Roblox's Terms of Service.
report_helper_warning_message: Reports are filed under your Roblox account. Review all information before submitting and only report genuine violations.
report_page_manager_autofill_failed: Auto-fill failed. Please manually fill the report form with the appropriate details.
report_page_manager_autofill_failed_clip: Auto-fill unavailable. Report text copied to clipboard. You can paste it into the comment field manually.
report_page_manager_success_message: Form filled successfully! Review and submit when ready.
settings_help_advanced_violations: Display detailed violation messages and evidence. May contain mature content.
settings_help_cache_duration: How long to cache user status data (1-10 minutes). Higher values reduce API calls but may show outdated information.
settings_help_debug_logging: Show detailed logs in the browser console (F12 -> Console) for troubleshooting.
settings_help_developer_mode: Unlock advanced developer settings and API integration management.
settings_help_experimental_custom_apis: Connect third-party content analysis APIs alongside Rotector.
settings_help_language: Auto uses your browser's language setting. Select a specific language to override.
settings_help_preset: Display mode controls whether flagged user content is blurred. Custom indicates you've modified individual settings.
settings_help_theme: Auto follows Roblox's theme setting. Light and Dark override this preference.
settings_help_translate_violations: Automatically translates violation messages to your browser language when viewing tooltips.
settings_modal_paragraph1: This setting displays the specific evidence that caused a user to be flagged, such as text from their profile, detected outfit issues, or other content violations. This helps you understand why someone was flagged and allows you to contribute more detailed reports.
settings_modal_paragraph2: Since evidence includes actual user-generated content, it may contain inappropriate material. You can disable this anytime in settings.
tooltip_cross_signal_message: The AI was more aggressive in its evaluation because supporting evidence was detected in other areas. Content flagged here may seem borderline on its own.
tooltip_discord_tase_description: The All Seeing Eye - a partner initiative
tooltip_header_integration: This {0} has been flagged by a third-party content analysis system.
tooltip_header_mixed_group: This group contains a mix of appropriate and inappropriate members.
tooltip_header_mixed_user: This user has been linked to inappropriate content, but lacks sufficient evidence for Roblox action. They could also be a victim. Exercise caution.
tooltip_header_past_offender: This {0} had inappropriate content previously but their account currently appears clean.
tooltip_header_pending: This {0} has been flagged by AI with {1}% confidence.
tooltip_header_queued_processing: This {0} is currently being checked by our system. This may take a few minutes.
tooltip_header_queued_safe: This {0} has been reviewed by our AI system and appears to be safe. If this is incorrect, please report it to us.
tooltip_header_safe: This {0} has not been reviewed yet.
tooltip_header_unsafe: This {0} has been verified as inappropriate by human moderators.
tooltip_metadata_reprocess_title: This user's data is outdated. Click to requeue for analysis.
tooltip_no_data_available: No data available for this API
tooltip_outfit_message: An outfit worn by this user was detected. Outfit detection can have false positives, so please use your own judgment.
tooltip_reportable_message: This user has clear evidence of inappropriate content that is visible to Roblox moderators.
tooltip_restricted_message: Your account has been flagged by Rotector and extension access has been revoked.
voting_description: Help others by confirming if this user's status is accurate.
voting_disagree_disabled_confirmed: Disagree voting is not available for confirmed users
